# Chapter 3. The Root Filesystem
#

m bin
m boot
m dev
m etc
# lib/ is created later considering arch-based logic
m media
m mnt
m opt
m sbin
m srv
m tmp ugo=rwxt
m usr
m var

m etc/opt
m etc/local
# etc/xml	do we want this?
# etc/sgml	do we want this?

m home
# lib<qual> are created later considing arch-based logic
m root 0700

# who defined this?
m sbin/init.d
